forecast.day_comments: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 4. Calm wind.
forecast.night_comments: Snow, mainly after 4pm. The snow could be heavy at times.  High near 29. Calm wind becoming south 5 to 7 mph in the afternoon.  Chance of precipitation is 80%. New snow accumulation of 1 to 2 inches possible.
